items.sentence: I remember it as if it were yesterday, but in reality it was fifteen years ago.
I think what impressed me most was the way Tom could talk to just about anyone.
I wish I could take back all those terrible things I said about you last night.
Do you want a second opinion? I can get another doctor to come here right away.
I heard they found a skeleton buried in the basement of a house on Park Street.
I want to be able to walk down this street without worrying about getting shot.
Tom converted about half of his yen into dollars and the other half into euros.
Tom emptied the water out of the bottle before he refilled it with fresh water.
I can\'t believe that you wouldn\'t enjoy playing cards with me and my friends.
Tom isn\'t the only one who doesn\'t have enough money to buy something to eat.
